name: amalgamation
description: Be sure to walk up (using the up arrow key or W )as soon as the game starts.  Be sure to explore everything.  Every object has multiple lines of dialog.  This game only reflects the views and experiences of the author and nobody else.  Tw for body horror, negative self talk, and general icky feelings lightened with good old millennial dark humor.  This is my first game pls be nice thanks
